dict.string: Messi really devotes all of his goals to his grandmother, raising his hands to heaven?
Paolo Maldini - the player with the most participation in the Champions League
Balotelli: Barcelona is the only club in the world that has 2 stadiums. "Camp Nou" for matches and "Santiago Bernabeu" for training
Gianluigi Buffon: At the hotel I do not watch a penalty shootout. I'm watching adult video
Alex Ferguson: Mourinho is the last person to talk about judges. For his own good, he'd better be silent until the end of the season.
Paul Ince: I love rolling. They are even better than sex.
Zlatan: If I were given the "Golden Ball", I would have given it to Messi the next day
President of Porto: Iker Casillas did not live up to our expectations. Because of him, we dropped out of the Champions League.
